name: com.unity.2d.common
description: 2D Common is a package that contains shared functionalities that are used by most of the other 2D packages.

samples.description: Samples to get started with SpriteAtlas

_upm.changelog:
### Changed
- Update minimum Unity version.

### Fixed
- DANB-811 Fix blurry Sprite Atlas Sample variant scene sprites
- DANB-794 Fixed case where editing the Closed and Open Sprite Shapes is choppy
